軯字的基本解释

軯
pēng
象声词，车声。
象声词，霹雳声：“丰隆軯其震霆兮。”

軯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pēng］
［《集韻》披耕切，平耕，滂。］
象声词。多形容雷声、钟鼓声等。

軯字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軯； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1241第27
【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?披耕切，音伻。【玉篇】車行聲。　又鐘鼓聲。【張衡·東京賦】軯磕隱訇。　又雷聲。【張衡·思?賦】豐隆軯其震霆兮。【註】豐隆，雷神也。

軯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
軯字的起名意思

暂无。

軯
Basic explanation of words
軯
pēng
Onomatopoeia, car sound.
Onomatopoeia, thunderbolt: "Hong Leong stuns its thunder."
軯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [pēng]
["Ji Yun" Phi ploughing and cutting, flat ploughing, plowing. ]
Onomatopoeia. More to describe thunder, bells and drums, etc.

[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　軯; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1241 Page 27
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Phi Gengqie, sound 伻. [Jade articles] The sound of cars.　The bells and drums again. 【Zhang Heng·Tokyo Fu】The scorpion is hidden.　Thunder again. [Zhang Heng·Si? Fu] Hong Leong is stunned. [Note] Hong Leong, Thor also.
